name: test_e2e_with_logs[478_CMDI_CLOUD_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMDI_CLOUD_003` |
| **Name** | Azure account command injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | cloud_cmd |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;az account show`
- **Encoded**: `%3Baz%20account%20show`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~49000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:20:29.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_CLOUD_003-1772266829880-13kzlq pattern_id=CMDI_CLOUD_003 uri=/?q=%3Baz%20account%20show client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_CLOUD_003-1772266829880-13kzlq pattern_id=CMDI_CLOUD_003 uri=/?q=%3Baz%20account%20show client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
